actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 911(a)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit alien residents to exclude from gross income certain income earned abroad in the same manner as U.S. citizens.

summary.text: Permits, under the Internal Revenue Code, alien residents to exclude from gross income that income earned abroad in the same manner as United States citizens.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 911(a)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit alien residents to exclude from gross income certain income earned abroad in the same manner as U.S. citizens.
